short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Assists in populating NICS E-Check and other state required forms

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Our NICS Extension provides our clients with a simple tool to auto-fill data between two specified websites for their ease of convenience.
